website_summaries.verdict: This heavy-duty trampoline fits multiple kids and keeps them safe, with a gap-free mat design that helps prevent common injuries.
pros: Comes in choice of 12-foot, 14-foot, and 15-foot models
Weight limits on all sizes is above 300 pounds, so it can hold multiple children
Includes enclosure net, safety pad, ladder, and rain cover
Heavy-duty frame made from hot-dipped galvanized steel
cons: Rain tarp is a bit flimsy

customer_reviews.title: By far the worse product I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: By far the worse product I have purchased. Missing parts and they continue to ignore my emails and phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: already has a hole with moderate use from a seven year oldand 4 year child..
customer_reviews.text: We bought this trampoline thinking it would be really duarable and last a long time because of the price and brand, but sadly not the case It Has a hole in it with very moderate use with a 7 year old and a four year old. I’m no longer happy with this purchase and will have to spend over $20.00 to repair it on an expensive trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best trampoline!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the ease of assembling, especially the enclosure. The trampoline, ladder, spring padding, and enclosure are well-built. The bounce on the mat is great. The padding covering the springs is thick. I appreciate having a cover to protect the trampoline against the harsh southwest sun. The Zupapa trampoline we bought has the net outside the springs and replaced one (BouncePro) that had the net inside the springs. We replaced numerous nets on the old trampoline which involved having to thread rope in and out of the enclosure to attach it to the trampoline. The Zupapa enclosure did not involve this time-consuming threading; the Zupapa was easy to attach and is very secure. Totally happy with the purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, great quality product. Well worth the money. Come with spring pulling tool and gloves, and has all the hardware needed. More then expected. Does not have stakes but as heavy duty as this is you dont need them. Very impressed. Iput it together by reading the simple instructions in about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: les

customer_reviews.title: Great trampoline, very bouncy and can hold good weight
customer_reviews.text: Great trampoline, very bouncy and can hold good weight. My husband made me research like crazy for safety and for quality. This one was the best I could find in a normal price range. We've had it about 2 months and it's been wonderful!!
customer_reviews.author: Reader12

customer_reviews.title: Not too stiff
customer_reviews.text: We like the trampoline and the net, easy set up. However, the net does not secure all the way around the bottom. My son slipped on the edge, his leg went between the net and the pad and he got stuck with his leg hanging below the trampoline. Yes, I was there and got him out. No, he was not injured. No, it is not an actual hazard and we do know the risks of a trampoline. Just one of those things to be aware of and educate the kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lee Ploegman Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Zipper doesn't close fully
customer_reviews.text: We spent extra money on this version of trampoline because of all the positive reviews. Our trampoline does not fully close when zipped. It is a safety problem. I am more than happy to revisit my review if someone could look at the pictures I have or come out to inspect to see if there is a problem/defect.
customer_reviews.author: RedRider

customer_reviews.title: High quality materials, easy assembly, beautiful trampoline. Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I paid more than some other brands in order to get this wonderful trampoline. It was easy to assemble---most of the work was done by 11yo and his tribe of friends---and its components are all clearly of the highest quality. I got this large model because I knew it would be impossible to prevent multiple children from jumping at once and figured larger would be safer. It is pretty darn big and we had to pretend to my husband/their dad that it was the smallest option to avoid a barrage of justified complaints. But it's fantastic. I use it myself for a quick workout. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Reznikoff

customer_reviews.title: Bouncing with joy
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this. the setup is pretty easy and it came in three boxes that are nicely labeled and the order of things is also perfect.I have taken help of my teenage son and assembled it in about 45 minutes.the trickiest part for me is pushing the support foam into the closed enclosure chutes. but once done it is lots of fun. My son spends lot of time every day in trampoline and it keeps him from boredom. My daughter wants to hang out with friends and jump with them. since it is so big, three to four kids can have fun under adult supervision to make sure, they do not fall on each other.
customer_reviews.author: SuperP72

customer_reviews.title: The trampoline itself is fun and sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: The trampoline itself is fun and sturdy enough. Its longevity is questionable. The blue ring pad has been flaking off due to weather starting about 6 months. 1 year of use and the stitckes on one of the pole sleeves ripped off. The pad and net replacements will be about 50% the purchase price. So spending $250/yr after initial purchase doesn't make it a great value or quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ayan S

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but not in the sun
customer_reviews.text: Fun trampoline, but easily susceptible to sun damage. Kids love to jump. I bought the best money could buy in hopes that it would last years and years. That may be true for the actual tramp, but be prepared to replace the netting and pads YEARLY if you live in a sunny area. Netting and pads show sun damage after about 12 months. Pics taken after 18 months when a 4 year old pulled the netting right off.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome family fun!!
customer_reviews.text: This Trampoline has been awesome! It has a higher weight rating than most on the market which was a huge plus for us! The adults enjoy it just as much as the kids! We decided to put this one in ground after the first 2 years of use and it has been such a great upgrade! We couldn't be happier with our purchase! Lan in customer service is awesome as well! We needed a replacement part after our mat was ripped and he got back with us and helped right away!
customer_reviews.author: StacE

customer_reviews.title: Great product AND great customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased this trampoline because it had such great reviews and it has been a great trampoline. We’ve had it for a little over a year now and have only had one issue. I never dreamed the customer service would be so awesome! Once I contacted them and told them my problem, by the end of the week I had what I needed. LAN - Thank you for your quick responses and solving my problem so quickly! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Diogo Tavares

customer_reviews.title: Super Bouncy
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a good trampoline. It is very bouncy and quality mat. We didn't set use the net; the trampoline itself only took 30 min to assemble. We had no problems with the tramp until a large wind storm picked it up and took it for a ride across the yard. The pad has been on the tramp for 9 months in cold and warm weather and is still in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: bigmamamash

customer_reviews.title: Great jumping and safety net and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Heather for helping us assist with getting a replacement part without hazzle! Our young kids have hrs of fun on our Zupapa trampoline and it was unfortunate that a strong wind broke one of the poles in two. We chose this trampoline over other brands based on the positive reviews when there needs to be replacement parts ordered and are happy we did. Also the net is very great and adds great safety which is most important. The jumping is very good and would easily agree that its better than the Propel we had in the past, same goes for the net.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Nieuwoudt

customer_reviews.title: This trampoline is huge! I bought it because it ...
customer_reviews.text: This trampoline is huge! I bought it because it has a higher weight limit and I figured we would need that when our grandson gets older and multiple kids are on there! It took 3 people about an hour to construct it. The only thing I am concerned with is that the entrance opening is not every big and it strains to zip up completely, which may cause it to rip if a child eagerly zips it up or snaps the buckles too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Granny60

customer_reviews.title: Best trampoline on the market
customer_reviews.text: We have had our Zupapa trampoline for four years now and it has been absolutely wonderful. The frame is strong and sturdy and also has a durable bounce pad. Also, springs still look brand new with no rust in sight. Our family has enjoyed hours of fun jumping and would recommend this trampoline to anyone in the market for one. You will definitely be extremely pleased by the quality of this exceptional trampoline. Also, Zupapa’s customer service is fantastic. Heather is amazing and will go above and beyond to help with any questions or issues. Thank you Zupapa for the joy you have brought our family.
customer_reviews.author: donna young

customer_reviews.title: 15 Foot Trampoline
customer_reviews.text: Overall very happy with the purchase. Definitely a two person job putting it together. The15 foot trampoline is the way to go, highly recommend it as it provides lots of room for single or double jumpers at one time. My kids are pretty young and the 15 foot trampoline isn't too much space more like comfortable space to avoid injuries from bumping into each other. Setting up the safety net is a bit of a pain, but almost essential as it really adds a layer of safety that you won't truly understand until you install it. I've had the trampoline for 6 months now with no issue, overall very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Messer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for the whole family.
customer_reviews.text: The whole family loves this trampoline. I have a four and two year old who use this, they can easily get themselves in and out, and I feel good knowing their safe and cant fall off the trampoline. It seems sturdy and well made, and all parts function as they should. It was relatively quick and easy for my husband and two helpers to put together without complaint. I really like that this has a higher weight capacity than most others similar to it. Overall just a really good purchase for our family.
customer_reviews.author: K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Phoenix, AZ and everyone knows that means hot with sun rot, and have had the trampoline for a few years. I just recently had to replace the spring pad and safety net because, you know, a bunch of kids under 10 beating it up. The main parts of the trampoline have help up extremely well and still look great, the main black part hasn’t faded or stretched. I contacted the seller directly and they arranged to ship me the parts quickly. Excellent customer service on top of an excellent product. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: blondie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t seem very bouncy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and nice safety features. Pad material seems kinda cheap but time will tell. When you are struggling with getting the foam poles through the sleeves have someone up on the trampoline holding the sleeve and keeping the pole tip in the middle. I don’t feel like it’s as bouncy as it should be. Perhaps it’s the 15ft span that makes it harder to bounce high.
customer_reviews.author: ahealy

customer_reviews.title: I’m so disappointed in this item
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed in this item! My kids got it for Christmas last year and the pieces that connect the springs to the trampoline are coming off. Springs are flying off as my children are jumping and this is very unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!  5 STARS!
customer_reviews.text: I don't leave many comments, but thought I should on this one because it exceeded my expectations! My kids love this trampoline! Easy to assemble - about an hour and a half. Instructions very clear and it's hard to make a mistake assembling it the way the parts all fit together. UPS dropped off the boxes and one of them were damaged and a couple of springs were lost in shipment. Nothing else was lost or damaged. Seller promptly acknowledged our issue and sent replacements. Great trampoline!
customer_reviews.author: Spassu

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this 15 foot trampoline for a Christmas gift. It seems very heavy duty. Very easy to put together, my husband, my son and I did it in way less then an hour. The kids love it. We did have an issue with the main trampoline pad, as it had several tiny holes in it. Not the sellers fault by any means. I contacted the seller and immediately they sent me a new one. SUPER good service!! I wouldn't hesitate to purchase from the same seller at all! Thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: amy roberts

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase. Is more expensive that I wanted to spend but well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Is more expensive that I wanted to spend but well worth it. Set up took about 1.5 hours with the help of my wife and 15 year old son. Instructions are pretty basic and the installation is almost self explanatory. Kids haven’t stop playing in it which is awesome seeing them of the tv and video games. Well built with strong materials... it is solid. Much better than the one we got at a super store Black Friday deal. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: justin fair

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Trampoline w/ Exceptional Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We received this trampoline a couple weeks ago and so far, so good. I have purchase two comparable trampolines from other manufacturers before, and this one appears very study in comparison. My packages arrived with two small bolts missing, and when I assembled the trampoline the net was too tight for the door to zip closed properly. I contacted customer service and dealt with Lan, and he couldn't have been more helpful. A new set of bolts and a new net arrived very quickly. Top notch customer service if you ever have an issue!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan C. McWhite

customer_reviews.title: A Must have for kids & Parents
customer_reviews.text: This trampoline is absolutely fantastic! We have had it for over two years now, and my kids are literally on it every single day. We went for the largest one they make, and I am glad we did, it is fantastic, and they love having their friends over to play on it. Win win, the kids get healthy exercise time away from TV and Video games, and Mom and Dad enjoy some peace and quiet! You can't go wrong with Zupapa.
customer_reviews.author: Zack J Rogge

customer_reviews.title: Durable but safe
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the 15 ft trampoline 3 years ago. We live in northeast and it’s exposed to the weather all year round. Everything held up really well except for the spring pad and safety net. I recently inquired with them about getting new parts for this. They mentioned that the 2019 version has an improved safety feature and that I might want to get the jump mat too. I decided to do so and recently put it together and I’m glad I Purchased it. The new design is even better than the old and it still is durable as ever. We love it. Couldn’t ask for a better trampoline!
customer_reviews.author: ijeanieb

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it and GREAT customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this trampoline for 2 years. We still love it! We live in the hot AZ desert where the sun deteriorates outdoor items much more quickly. The net and pad had deteriorated over 2 years later, and the company STILL sent a new net and pad within days of my inquiry. I asked where to find replacement parts, thinking I would find and buy them. They asked me to send pics, I did, and they had a net/pad in the mail to me that same day, for FREE. Awesome! We would definitely buy again as the kids love it and I love their customer service!
customer_reviews.author: tweedoo

customer_reviews.title: Value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great temp for the money. Safe. Missing a couple of bolts but we had them on hand. Directions not as complete as we would have liked them. But all seven of us were assembling so really it could have been our communications!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs better Anchor system
customer_reviews.text: This trampoline was anchored to the ground with provided stakes because we know we live in a windy area. It disappeared during a period of high winds in October. We looked high and low, and asked neighbors with no luck. I’m shocked it flew away. During the 5 short months of having it, the kids and I loved it. I thought it was good quality. My recommendation is to improve the security. I can’t afford to buy another one and my homeowners won’t cover.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Gentile

customer_reviews.title: GREAT INVESTMENT
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this trampoline for a year now. With 18 grandchildren and numerous nieces and nephews this tramp is used daily rain, snow or sunshine. I love the safety and quality of this tramp. My grandchildren have all had cheaper trampolines that have not lasted long nor had the great bounce this one has. This is the first thing kids run for in my yard full of playground equipment.
customer_reviews.author: tsooyessgram

customer_reviews.title: Two year laster looks and plays new
customer_reviews.text: Two years later and still looks new, three kids and many others pounding on this all the time. I have nothing bad to say about it. I take the pad in for the winter, little bit of work but I think it keeps it new looking. We broke the it, contacted customer service and with in one day the responded with an email and sending parts. The parts came as promised! Great product great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: C. KEEFE

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: It took my husband and I about 2 hours to put this together, with the help of 3 kids. Compared to other trampolines I have seen and used this one is superb quality. Installation was rather easy. The "safety net" poles gave us the most problems. My recommendation for improvement is to have a mechanism that actually lock the poles together. My kids enjoyed jumping on it and I'm hoping it will "last" as itsexposed to the various elements.
customer_reviews.author: Letra

customer_reviews.title: Good trampoline, decent  price excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Very good trampoline, my sons had several months of enjoyment, the reason I don't give full 5 starts is that the post are on the thin side compare to other ones, however they hold pretty good. easy to assemble and sturdy enough to move around the garden, color has not fade since 6 months use. Customer service is excellent they resolve on time my issues.
customer_reviews.author: HEGO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This trampoline is fantastic! The directions to put together are super easy to follow and all of the parts fits together perfectly. The trampoline itself is great for people of all ages, from my elementary school siblings to my getting close to retirement parents. The safety is net is great and I love that the poles extend all of the way to the ground for greater stability. One of my favorite purchases by far!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret B

customer_reviews.title: We've had all ages on it and everyone's quite pleased! Quick tip- For the net surround
customer_reviews.text: The 15 footer arrived quickly in 3 large boxes and items were packed well. I assembled it solo in a couple hours and only needed a hand when fastening the net surround to the trampoline frame. We've had all ages on it and everyone's quite pleased! Quick tip- For the net surround, you have poles within padding like pipe insulation and it slides together into a sleeve. It will fight you every inch of the way. Grab the baby powder. Puff a bunch of it into the sleeve, then powder the padding, and it'll slip right in. The extra powder just falls out when you raise it all up for installation.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Very good product and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: As I did my reviews of many products I settled on this one for the positive reviews and the safety features. This product went together fairly easy but the instructions do need need a bit more details. It took about 1 hour to assemble. Overall I will say it's a great product and my daughter's are very happy with it. The boxes were damaged during delivery and I was missing a few parts and contacted the seller and they immediately sent out replacements. I would recommend this product and being well built and as safe as a trampoline can be.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Y

customer_reviews.title: Quality Trampoline
customer_reviews.text: We bought this trampoline as a Christmas present in 2018. It is a very sturdy trampoline and the kids love it. It has held up almost 2 years with many kids enjoying it. In the description it is recommended to have 2 people put it together and this is true, otherwise assembly is straightforward and easy. Make sure to assemble it close to the location you want it to be since moving it is a challenge even with 2 people. The safety netting and spring covers are essential when kids are jumping every which way. Our kids have been saved from a fall by the netting several times. Highly recommended product and customer service answers promptly to emails.
customer_reviews.author: DonH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We had some issues with the trampoline but customer service was AMAZING! After getting the entire mat put on we realized there was a missing loop :( I contacted CS and they shipped me a new mat right away! I would definitely purchase again, this is not a cheapy Wal-Mart trampoline, this is great quality, super bouncy, and much higher weight limit than others.
customer_reviews.author: Jen K

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Awesome Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the 15” trampoline for my kids a year ago. My daughter is on it nearly every day in the spring through fall months. We do take it down in the winter. The trampoline had nice bounce and appreciate the safety features the surround enclosure offers. This spring we had to contact customer service for a couple replacement poles for the enclosure. We put the trampoline up after the weather warmed up and then had a late winter storm with high winds that bent 2 the poles. Customer service was awesome to work with and within about 10 days we had the parts we needed! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Olesen

customer_reviews.title: Great trampoline and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The trampoline is great quality and I love that the 15 ft one can hold 375 lbs. After doing much research, this was the best value for the size/weight limit. I even reached out to the seller, Brandline, for replacement parts when we received some wind damage and customer service associate, Lan, was extremely helpful.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Was ok .
customer_reviews.text: Trampoline was great , just sad that I can’t put the zipper down and seems like it’s already trying to fall off too each time I keep unzipping it . Now I can’t just watch my 2 year old by sitting down without being in front of the zipper . Well update after it starts to fall off completely.
customer_reviews.author: Jissell O.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price. Highest quality.
customer_reviews.text: Used Amazon services for assembly. Inexpensive & worth it. This is the highest quality trampoline I’ve ever owned, and the padding/safety is great. Kids are using it more than the last one, I believe because it has a firmer bounce, maybe due to spring quality or the last one was just broken in too much. Great trampoline, go ahead and spend the few extra dollars on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip A. Motsinger

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing Trampoline
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the 15' Zupapa trampoline as a Christmas gift and couldn't be happier! We have three kiddos that have just exploded with excitement since opening it up. The build was rather seamless with great instructions and in no time the kids were floating up in the air. The smiles on their faces as they jump is priceless and we are so happy with the Zupapa. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a quality trampoline!
customer_reviews.author: T. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and service.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic trampoline, high quality everything. My husband and son easily assembled it and my kids LOVE it. I got the net so it's very safe. But here's the best part. When I needed a few parts about a year later the company could NOT have been easier to work with. Friendly. Helpful. Courteous. And I got all the parts I needed for an easy fix. I highly recommend this product and company. I wish every company had customer service like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Very sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very sturdy and easy to assemble. Took my husband about 2 1/2 hours by himself. Not sure what to do with the cover because it holds water when it rains and weighs the mat down badly unless ground is 100% level and cover is taught for water to drain through the little center hole. But, it's good in theory and can keep the mat cool on a sunny day if it is in direct sunlight. We roll it to the side to jump. We just have to take it off if it is going to rain or snow. The trampoline is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deana Green

customer_reviews.title: My daughters (ages 7 and 5) love this trampoline
customer_reviews.text: My daughters (ages 7 and 5) love this trampoline. Unlike some other trampolines with a weight limit in the 200 pound-range, this one easily supports an adult and a bunch of kids. We have had it for over a year now and it has held up well. We did have an issue with the pad over the springs coming apart, but the company stepped up and said they would send us a free replacement, even though it was out of warranty. We are very happy with the trampoline and service and would have no hesitation in recommending it to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most awesome trampoline ever
customer_reviews.text: Most awesome trampoline ever!!! High quality. Very sturdy and fairly easy to put together. Hardest part about assembly was pushing the rods up through the netting sleeves while keeping the foam pads in place. My husband and I put it all together in maybe just over an hour. Everything you need to put it together comes with it: T-shaped spring tool, U-shaped ground anchors, and even gloves to keep your fingers from getting pinched. Ladder is included too. Not a huge fan of the ladder since the bare metal bars aren't really comfortable to step on but it's pretty sturdy. Wouldn't change a thing about the trampoline itself though. My family has already enjoyed it immensely!
customer_reviews.author: Mgarrett

customer_reviews.title: Great product and lots of fun.
customer_reviews.text: This product came in 3 days vs. the expected 7-9 days due to our current situation in the world. The instructions were incredibly easy to follow along, and for the base I was able to employ my 6 year old to help me put it together. I was however missing a step to the ladder and reached out to the company. They were extremely apologetic and sincere and rushed shipping the step to my door. All in all amazing experience, great customer service, and quality product; what more could you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Devan

customer_reviews.title: My young son fell out of the properly constructed "no gap" construction 4 times in 2 days
customer_reviews.text: The way the net attaches to the base creates a real hazard if a young one falls against the net. No matter how you cross tie, tie, clip or buckle the net to the base, children can fall out. This model is unsafe for anyone under the age of 5 years old IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Janson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: the product is great - we have had it for two years and we moved it by tying a rope to the leg and pulled so we could mow - it bent one of the frame rails and i contacted customer service and Heather was amazing - they shipped out the replacement part right away and sent an email after confirming it all worked out and we where happy! I would definitely buy this brand again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Prince

customer_reviews.title: Super-fun and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We had a similar Skywalker trampoline for years and basically wore it out so needed to replace it. This Zupapa appears to be of equally great quality, was relatively easy to assemble (I’m a mom and was able to assemble it with my 13 year old in about 2-3 hours), is very sturdy, and easily withstands heavy use by multiple large-ish kids (not recommended by the manufacturer 😉). So far, after about a month, it seems great - no complaints. I absolutely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of boys

customer_reviews.title: Awesome trampoline!
customer_reviews.text: We love our trampoline. The size is perfect for our four boys to jump on it. We use it almost daily. We bought additional metal stakes to make sure it is not flying away during heavy winds but it probably would be fine without them too. The kids enjoy the trampoline and we would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Regina R

customer_reviews.title: Company stands behind product.
customer_reviews.text: Zupapa company stands behind their product. I had purchased a 15 trampoline last fall off amazon. Worked great no problems. I didn’t bother to tie trampoline down because I like to move it so I could mow underneath it. We had a bad wind storm where It blew it over and damaged the upright poles. I contacted the company to purchase some replacement poles. After I showed proof of purchase and picture of the bent poles they sent me replacement poles free of charge! I’ve never dealt with such a company. I’d totally recommend without hesitation. If I ever need to buy another one it will definitely be a zupapa.
customer_reviews.author: David Rhoads

customer_reviews.title: Great Trampoline....very sturdy, easy to assemble, great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This it the 3rd Zupapa Tramoline that we have purchased (one for our house, one for our camp, and one as a gift!!) ! We are experts at it. We have spoken with neighbors who have purchased other trampolines and they have constant issues with theirs. The Zupapa trampoline has incredible quality, along with a sturdiness that puts a parents mind at ease. With the help of this trampoline's instructions, there is an ease of putting it together to allow hours of fun for the kids and adults!! The customer service at the factory is extremely helpful and courteous....with companies changing, you don't always receive this. This is the brand to choose, you won't be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: D M S

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase in a very long time
customer_reviews.text: The trampoline has been the best purchase we have made in a very long time for our kids. They play on it everyday for hours and sleep likes babies! I love the net and how high it is and I feel relaxed when they are playing on it! It has high quality construction and materials for peace of mind, safety and fun! It’s going to be an epic summer with this trampoline! We are going to enjoy this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Martina Hempel

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty big awesome 15 trampoline.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty big awesome trampoline. Love the trampoline! it took me about an hour and a half to assemble. The hack that I figured out is that when assembling the safety net to duck tape the noodles to the pipe to reduce friction on the edges. They slid right in.
customer_reviews.author: michael pixley

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer support.
customer_reviews.text: After months of research, I finally settled on the Zupapa trampoline for our family. I was impressed with the ratings but more specifically, the safety measures Zupapa utilizes. We have our trampoline just over 2.5 years and it has performed perfectly. We just had a problem with the zipper on the safety netting and when I reached out to Zupapa customer service, Lan from customer service responded quickly and though of out of warranty...Lan still offered to assist with our problem! Hopefully we will have a replacement net soon and the kids can get back to jumping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun with a good quality trampoline
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren are truly enjoying this trampolin, ages 15 -2 years. Love the safety net, no worries about the younger ones falling off. Great quality, sturdy and well worth the money. I would recommend getting extra tie downs to secure it in place for windy days.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy D.

customer_reviews.title: Kids of all ages love this thing!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to my 8 year old for his birthday. His older brothers and their friends barely get off for long enough for him to use it. Assembly took three people about an hour and a half. Very easy esp if you look at the online video. It has incredible bounce and sturdiness. A fantastic product all around. Buy one! Your family will love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy S.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately do not hold up any better than the cheapest ones available
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product and especially the customer service
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for Christmas for our daughters. They absolutely love it! The instructions were clear and easy to understand for the setup. Parts went together without any difficulty and it was set up in no time! Furthermore, when we reached out to customer service we were met with timely, fantastic service. We highly recommend this product and company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 years later and still a great trampoline, sturdy and springy  as when we first got it!
customer_reviews.text: The trampoline itself has been wonderful (4 years old now). The mat is n grate shape, the springs are still as bouncy as when it first arrived, and it's absolutely as sturdy as can be. However -- the zipper on the net broke within the first year of use, as did the ladder that it came with. Trying to figure out how to replace them is not as easy as I wish. Overall -- very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erica S. Lea

customer_reviews.title: The best trampoline...
customer_reviews.text: I looked high and low for a trampoline that would last a long time and accommodate teenagers (with the occasional adult). Three years later I know I made the right choice. Zupapa makes a quality trampoline that has lasted through the Arizona sun with sprinklers underneath. (Not the best placement, I know, but it was our only available space.) We recently replaced the spring cover and safety net; I didn't think the parts were available but Heather at Zupapa helped us out. Our trampoline is like new again! Not only is it a great way to let off energy during this quarantine, it doubles as a place to 'camp out' in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: TheresaZimm

customer_reviews.title: Great Trampoline!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE our trampoline. We have a large amount of kids over at our house often, they all are able to safely play on the trampoline. We live in Texas and it has held up great to the Texas sun, the trampoline isn't faded at all. While this trampoline is a little pricier than some of the others, we chose it so it could grow with our kids. It has a higher weight limit than any other trampoline we looked at and the customer service and warranty was outstanding as well.
customer_reviews.author: Allison S.

customer_reviews.title: Great trampoline! Even better customer service.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this trampoline last year for the grandkids to play on at my parents’ house. Assembly was straightforward and the kids loved it! This Spring it was damaged in a windstorm. I contacted Brandline/Zupapa and they got back to me right away. Their representative, Jenna, was a fantastic point of contact and had the needed parts delivered to me in record time. For free!! She even followed up to be sure the parts were correct and everything worked after delivery. Jenna was pleasant and fun- so refreshing in an automated world. I applaud her and Brandline/Zupapa for their superior product and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: A. Crandall

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and customer support
customer_reviews.text: We purchased our Zupapa trampoline last summer and our kids, along with friends, have had hours of fun playing on it. My husband and I assembled it without much trouble, and the instructions are clear. Last week we endured a huge winter storm, and the trampoline blew over and broke in places. I luckily found an e-mail for customer support, and was hugely impressed when within hours of sending my email, Lan responded and helped me. After specifying what parts where damaged and including pictures, we were promptly sent the replacement parts. So thankful for their quick and thoughtful response!
customer_reviews.author: Martina

customer_reviews.title: Great trampoline, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this trampoline for a year. My kids and I set it up quickly and they’ve been enjoying it ever since! Make sure you stake it down well. A bad storm blew ours across the road even though it was staked down. Only one piece of the frame was damaged and the customer service quickly sent a replacement. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had at least 4 previous trampolines and this one is the best. The outer padding goes under the mat and the attachments hook underneath instead of having to tie. That was a huge help when assembling. The structure is high quality and I feel that my kids are safe. Customer service is awesome. We had a severe thunderstorm come through one night and the winds blew the trampoline about 40 yards and damaged it. I contacted the company and have them the parts I needed and they replaced them right away. The only negative thing is the clamps to secure the trampoline will not secure it. I’ll go to Home Depot and buy some.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in December for a 9 yr old gymnast and had to wait until April 27th to put it together due to the weather in New Hampshire. I started to put it together around 9:00 and was finished before 11:00. She spends so much time on this trampoline working on her routines she never wants to come in. Her friends are lined up waiting to come over for play dates. This is easily the best recreational item I've bought for her.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Douai

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Finally found something that will get the kids out of the house. We've had it for a year now and it gets used almost daily during the summer months and it has been holding up very well. Would highly recommend that you stake it into the ground, we didn't do that and wind storm tipped it up on it's side last fall and bent two of the net poles ...with that customer support has been outstanding helping us get replacements. I've very pleased that we can get this fixed without having to throw it out and buy new one! Too many times I find products are throw-a-way; which, is not the case here.
customer_reviews.author: Shane McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this trampoline
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love this trampoline and jump on it almost every day throughout the summer. I love how big it is and the fact that it can hold more weight than the smaller versions. We have had the trampoline for two years now and it has held up well through snow, rain, sun, etc. Customer support has also been extremely responsive and helpful - I had an inquiry through amazon regarding the safety cover over the springs, and they responded very quickly and professionally. I would definitely recommend this trampoline to others who are interested in buying.
customer_reviews.author: Kim C

customer_reviews.title: Best Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We bought this trampoline for my daughters 7th birthday in March 2020. All 3 of my kids loved it; played on it everyday. I even jumped with them a couple of times. In April 2020 the trampoline BLEW.AWAY-due to a nor’easter. Let’s be clear it was raining and windy for 48 hours-the trampoline didn’t blow away until the 46th hour. She (and all of us) were devastated. I emailed the company and they couldn’t have been kinder. They sent all new replacement parts free -that we received 1 week later! I was shocked and amazed. In this time of global crisis-I couldn’t believe how kind they were.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Oconnor

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Would totally recommend! Had some mishaps, but nothing to get upset over with. We had originally received two big boxes and I didn’t even notice there was supposed to three boxes. Up until the last one was dropped off that we realized it was missing. Lol Assembling took time, but only because it was mainly one person working on it. But it would be easy and faster with more people around to help. So far so good. We’ll see how it holds up!
customer_reviews.author: Micah B.

customer_reviews.title: Strong and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: This was great I love it and so do all my nephews I got this as a birthday gift, it was simple to put together. It was strong enough to survive the hurricane that came through Florida. No bent poles or anything but a tree branch managed to fall put a hole in the mat. I would say if your on the fence about this get it.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod R.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed in longevity
customer_reviews.text: Overall the trampoline was great for the first year or more. However, then the net started to get holes in it, it wasn't long until the entire net was ripping off of the poles, and all of the stuffing was coming out of the pad. Extremely poor customer service if you have issues. Paid more money than other options out there hoping for a product that could last, very disappointed that it did not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Customer Service I've Ever Seen!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Worked great until huge windstorm blew away trampoline (not anchored, so totally my fault). I disassembled it (also easily, if you move or have bad winters) to find I needed 2 replacement parts. Dorothy at Zupapa customer support not only sent me the parts 2 days later, she sent them FREE! I expected to pay for parts and shipping (they're 4 ft long) but it was covered by the company even though not technically by warranty. Trampoline is back in business...
customer_reviews.author: paul jeffords

customer_reviews.title: Great Trampoline!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several other brand of trampolines in the past. This trampoline is better quality than the trampolines one would purchase from Walmart or other department stores. Zupapa brand has my support for being a 5 star brand. Their customer service representative Lan will work with you to determine any replacement parts you may have or need over the years of owning your trampoline. I have had this same specific trampoline now for 4 years, it is the 15 ft round and highly recommended. Thank you Lan for all your help! You will not be disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Shambaugh

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and went together fairly easily. Except for the poles, those were a pain in the butt to get into the sleeves. The other thing I don’t like is that visually, the spring protector lefts up every time my kids jump. The springs are still covered, but it collects dirt and bunches on the side. Visually it doesn’t look as clean as the pictures
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING trampoline, very bouncy, very fun, very easy
customer_reviews.text: This is the only trampoline I've owned, so I have nothing to compare it to, but I have been on friends' trampolines and this is by far the bounciest I've been on. The assembly is very simple, the instructions are very helpful. The net is very well made, probably has saved me multiple hospital trips for the month that I've owned it. (The reason that I say "I" is because I'm a teenager writing this). The only complaint I have, which isn't really a complaint, is that the rain cover doesn't help anything, if you try and dump the water off, the trampoline will get wet anyways, so better to not waste your time with it.
customer_reviews.author: Van C

customer_reviews.title: We have purchased several other trampolines, but they have ...
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased several other trampolines, but they have all fallen apart ini about a year from frequent use by out teenagers. The springs broke, the legs bent, etc. They were not made for intensive use. We paid more for this model to get a much stronger design & noticed it was far stronger than the previous models we got at Walmart, Big 5 , etc. stores. Unless your kids are very small we suggest getting a heavy duty model such as this one. .
customer_reviews.author: Ian R. Waxler

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Reviews seemed great and it came with a warranty. The trampoline took 2 hours to assemble with a bit of help from my wife and the kids. It was not very difficult to setup and the instructions were easy enough to follow. The only issue, which wasn't worth removing a star, was that the foam around the safety net post isn't very stiff which made it difficult to push through the safety net.
customer_reviews.author: Nick H

customer_reviews.title: I love Zupapa!
customer_reviews.text: I love Zupapa! I ordered a 15 foot trampoline for my kids and they have enjoyed it almost everyday for over 2 years. It is excellent quality and we are thrilled that we decided to buy a Zupapa trampoline. We recently had a big storm and our trampoline flew across the yard and into a tree. A few pieces broke and Zupapa kindly and quickly sent us new replacement pieces. We are very happy with their excellent customer service. Thank you Zupapa!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Best trampoline and superb customer service
customer_reviews.text: The trampoline has been with us for 5 years and has been enjoyed by our 6 kids and their friends over the years but especially by my autistic son. Even at 22 he still loves it. It’s weathered the worst of climates here in Colorado. But the most amazing surprise was the customer service when we needed a new pole. They shipped it free of charge and were very accommodating. Worth every penny!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Craig A Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great trampoline
customer_reviews.text: I had a trampoline when I was 8 (I am 23). I bought this one for my little cousins and it outperforms my old one in every way. The 15 ft allows for me and both my cousins to get on and wrestle and bounce. The only bad thing is the net goes around the outside and causes the spring cover to roll up.
customer_reviews.author: Randy C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Trampoline
customer_reviews.text: We had another trampoline before we purchased our 15ft Zupapa. I can now jump with my two kids and feel safe. We have a lot of fun together on it. Last summer we had a windstorm that blew our neighbors trampoline into our yard, hitting our house twice and trampoline. Our Zupapa didn't move but hit two of our safety net poles and bent them over and ripping our net. I contacted the company this spring to replace the parts and they warrantied them. We are so happy with our trampoline purchase. This is our third season with it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: Look no further for an affordable, durable trampoline with kind, responsive customer service
customer_reviews.text: We love our Zupapa trampoline! After doing extensive research on safety and durability for a trampoline that could accommodate several jumpers, we settled on Zupapa, and I'm so glad that we did. The trampoline was easy to assembly, and our kids and friends have not stopped jumping since. Additionally, we have received incredible customer service from Zupapa with any questions we've had. Lan, our Zupapa contact, has been so responsive and thoughtful. We couldn't be happier with our entire Zupapa experience. If you are looking for an affordable, safe and durable trampoline from a great company, look no further than Zupapa.
customer_reviews.author: LRH

customer_reviews.title: Best Trampoline and Company!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his trampoline! We bought it for him back in November for his birthday. Recently we had a bad storm and a tree fell on it, damaging a few poles. I contacted the company and immediately they sent replacement poles, asking for nothing- not even the shipping cost! You don’t get customer service like this too often. I highly recommend this trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Quality and outstanding Costumer Service
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this trampoline 2 years ago and we haven’t had any issue with it. We use it everyday for Limphatic drainage and my daughter loves playing in it. It is like having a big playpen in the backyard. It requieres little maintenance to maintain. Costumer service provided outstanding costumer service when we needed replacement for some parts. Will recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Frida

customer_reviews.title: Zupapa is an amazing company. A great product that performs better than ...
customer_reviews.text: Zupapa is an amazing company. A great product that performs better than even advertised. Great Customer service. In fact, we have had the trampoline for about a year, and a strong Midwest Storm blew thru the area and picked up the trampoline and damaged it. They responded to my request immediately which is rare or online companies, did their due diligence, and sent me replacement parts at no cost. Who does that in today's day and age. Highly recommend them. 5 stars.. no way. 6 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Safe, sturdy, & awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We have all been living on this trampoline since we set it up. There are so many fantastic safety features. I especially love the way your feet can’t slip through the pad around the springs because of the no-gap feature. We have the 15ft & it’s huge!!! It is best to have a second person to help set up but it really wasn’t that difficult.
customer_reviews.author: sJag4

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit
customer_reviews.text: The trampoline we purchased more than met our needs. I had never gotten one online before but was looking for something a little larger and able to hold more weight. The stores around here did not carry such an item. The order came quickly and was easily put together by my 16 year old son. All three of my children have found it to be much better and "bouncy" than the three previous ones we owned. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome trampoline, amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to put together. Our teenage kids have had a blast on this trampoline, lots of bounce to it. Mom and dad even love it! We had an issue with the zipper on our net breaking and the emailed the company. They sent us a replacement net immediately and the customer service was amazing. I would buy from them again due to their outstanding replacement policy and customer service. Totally recommend spending the extra money for the quality of this product and knowing that safety is a top priority with this company. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Seller!
customer_reviews.text: After much research, we purchased this Zupapa trampoline on Amazon in May 2017 from the seller Brandline and are thrilled with our purchase. It was not difficult to assemble, held up beautifully through a very long Michigan winter, and jumping and playing on it is literally our 11 year old son's favorite thing to do. Although the construction is very high quality overall, the zipper broke recently and Brandline has made it quick and painless to get a replacement net under warranty so we are very pleased in that regard as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mamadetresninos

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: This trampoline is amazing. Our family loves it so much and is getting a ton of enjoyment out of it. It's super easy to set up, only needs two people for a few parts. Out mat was missing a ring and the company was very responsive when I contacted them, even over the busy holidays. They got a new mat shipped out to us very quickly. Their customer service is as impressive as the product. We would definitely recommend this trampoline and company to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Hamblen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, durable trampoline!
customer_reviews.text: This trampoline was exactly what I was hoping it would be. It arrived quickly, and my husband was able to assemble it in just a few hours. I did a lot of research before buying, and had almost convinced myself to purchase a $2,000 trampoline - as if it had to be that expensive to be the safest, most durable and fun option. Thankfully I talked myself out of that and went for the Zupapa. My kids (11,10,5) love it, and have lots of fun together jumping. I highly recommend the company’s customer service as well should any needs arise!
customer_reviews.author: Shawty bae

customer_reviews.title: Best quality, durability and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We researched trampolines for a long time before purchasing this one for Christmas one year ago. It was important to us that the trampoline be of sound quality, with a very large surface area, and be supported by excellent customer service from the company. This trampoline has been loved by children and adults and the trampoline mesh still looks brand-new and is not stretched out. We did need to replace the safety net recently and even though the item is technically out of warranty, the company is sending what we need for free! Their customer service team is very prompt and extremely friendly when communicating via email. I highly recommend purchasing a Zupapa trampoline!
customer_reviews.author: Amy M

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: love this product- very worth the money! we had someone come set this up for us, they did an amazing job and the trampoline is super fun and sturdy! 10/10 worth the money and definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Gina M. Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Nieces approve!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my nieces. Very sturdy. They seem to enjoy it and my brother and sister-in-law get in on the fun sometimes. Wish the weight limit was higher, just for piece of mind, but no problems thus far with an adult, 13 and 15 year old playing on it at once. Other kids in the neighborhood seem to like this one better than whatever they have.
customer_reviews.author: H B

product_meta.title: Zupapa 15 14 12 10 FT Trampoline 425LBS Weight Capacity for Kids with Safety Enclosure Net Outdoor Trampolines for Children Adults Family Backyards
feature_bullets: ❤️【No Gap Design Eliminates Hazards】The 2020 upgrade no gap design eliminates hazards of getting your hands or feet caught in the gaps cause the jumping mat and spring cover are tightly sewn together. Also the springs are all covered with thick and durable pad. What’s more, our new design expanded the jumping area.

❤️【Hot-dip Galvanizing Technique & Heavy-duty Frame】Zupapa 2020 trampolines use the latest hot-dip galvanizing technology to make the frame anti-rust, more stable and durable. And our unique two steel joints design along with W-shaped legs provide a solid base for the whole trampoline. Max weight capacity up to 425 lbs（12,14,15ft）& 375lbs(10ft). Comes with 6 pcs of wind stakes, make the trampoline stands stably even in storm.
❤️【More Springs & Impressive bounce】 As we all know springs are the core of the trampoline, we have 12 more springs to offer impressive bounce.

❤️【Higher Quality Materials for Max Safety】Galvanized rust resistant springs(7 inch) offer impressive bounce. Anti-UV jumping mat (made of PP) provides more weight capacity. 8.9ft higher enclosure net (made of environmental PE) ensures absolute safety and fastness when jumping. And the poles are padded with 10mm foam, can protect your kids from banging against the steel pole.

❤️【Much Longer Net Poles】Zuapap extends all the net poles wich reach the ground to make the net more stable and safer. What's more our 1.5mm steel frame tubes comparing with 1.0mm ordinary frame make the trampoline more sturdy.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
